column4: The ubuntu download page says that I need 192 megs of ram to install the desktop cd.  I only have 128 megs of ram.  how should I install it?
where do you live and what processor arch do you have? i'll send you a link to the right thin
I just need the "Server install CD", right?
I'm on the east coast of the united states and I have an intel
is there a torrent for it?
yes there is. is that an intel 32 bit?
sorry. my geography isn't that good. is the usa north america?
i just didn't see the 'alternate' cd
